About Me

Let me tell you a little about what i do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

After graduating from high school as an Electrician for Computers, I started working for a big company that produced sweat and chocolate. In less than 1 year, I have applied to study IT-Programming at Michael Pupin College in Zrenjanin. The IT-industry was on the rise back in 2012 and I wanted to grab the first row for the ride. Unfortunately, I finished only the 1st year and had to drop out because of financial reasons, even though I was on the "state budget" still in the 2nd year, but the city was too expensive for me back then. In the past 7 years I have traveled and worked a lot (Australia, Slovakia, Hungary...) This made me realize that my age-long ambition to work in the IT sector as a Developer has not passed.. I received an Udemy Course Certificate in Web Development without Frameworks, (HTML5 & CSS with SASS) and I developed a very deep interest in Web Design, so I booked another lesson in JavaScript Language. In my free time, I use my new knowledge to create commercial websites, and plan to do freelancing when I get comfortable with JavaScript to add extra functionalities to my projects. In addition, I have successfully passed the online English Teacher program and am about to start my teaching career as a side income. With my strong diligence and being a highly motivated individual, I am certain to push through with the dedication I have always worked with to accomplish my goals and gain more knowledge and insight in the IT Industry. Currently, I am looking for an internship position as a Junior Web Developer to acquire experience working on real-time world projects and to learn from senior developers, so I can further pursue my career as a Frontend Developer.
